intervals.description: Replace engine oil and oil filter. Use 10W-40 JASO MA rated motorcycle oil.
Check and adjust intake and exhaust valve clearances using shim-over-bucket system.
Drain and replace engine coolant. Use long-life coolant.
Replace spark plugs. Use NGK CR8EIA-9 or equivalent.
Check and adjust drive chain slack (20-30mm). Clean and lubricate chain.
Replace front and rear brake fluid. Use DOT 4 brake fluid.
Check brake pad thickness. Replace when pad material is at or below wear limit.
Inspect and adjust throttle cable free play (2-3mm). Lubricate cables.
Replace front fork oil. Inspect fork seals and dust boots.
